Title: Macbeth: The Comedy
Writer: Allison L. LiCalsi (screenplay), William Shakespeare (additional dialogue), William Shakespeare (story)
Actors: Erika Burke Rossa, Juliet Furness, Dudley Findlay Jr., Ted deChatelet
Plot: Take one power hungry lesbian couple. Throw in a slow-witted king, a Caribbean sidekick, a trio of flamboyantly gay weird sisters, and a host of other misfits. And what do you have? Macbeth...
